mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_write (wr_subject, wr_content, wr_name) VALUES (#{subject}, #{content}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT wr_id "id", wr_subject "subject", wr_content "content", wr_name "name", wr_viewcnt "viewcnt", wr_regdate "regDate" FROM test_write WHERE wr_id = #{id}
SELECT wr_id "id", wr_subject "subject", wr_content "content", wr_name "name", wr_viewcnt "viewcnt", wr_regdate "regDate" FROM test_write ORDER BY wr_id DESC;
